Infobox French commune name = Vignacourt region = [[Picardie]] department = [[Somme]] arrondissement = [[arrondissement of Amiens|Amiens]] canton = Picquigny INSEE = 80793 postal code = 80650 mayor = Stéphane DuCrotoy term = 2001–2008 intercommunality = [[Communauté de communes du Val de Nièvre et environs|Val de Nièvre et environs]] latitude = 50.0119 longitude = 2.1958 elevation m = 126 elevation min m = 37 elevation max m = 134 area km2 = 29.1 population = 2231 population date = 2006
'''Vignacourt''' is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Somme (department)|Somme]] [[Departments of France|department]] in [[Picardie]] in northern [[France]].
==Geography== Vignacourt is situated Convert10mikm0 northwest of [[Amiens]], on the D12 and D49 junction.
==Population== Demography 1962 = 1594 1968 = 1828 1975 = 2007 1982 = 2369 1990 = 2294 1999 = 2183 2006 = 2231 withoutdoublecount = 1962
==See also== *[[Communes of the Somme department]]
